original_text: The princes of Zoan are become fools, the princes of Noph are deceived; they have also seduced Egypt, even they that are the stay of the tribes thereof.
korean_text: 소안의 방백들은 어리석었고 놉의 방백들은 미혹되었도다 그들은 애굽 종족들의 모퉁잇돌이거늘 애굽을 그릇 가게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: The princes of Zoan are become fools
the princes of Noph are deceived
even they that are the stay of the tribes thereof
